data.price: (25) [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand [i.e., relax] for me my breast [with assurance]
(26) And ease for me my task
(27) And untie the knot from my tongue
(28) That they may understand my speech.

dua.name: Dua for Intellectual Growth
dua.significanceReason: Specifically requests divine assistance in expanding knowledge, understanding, and communication skills.
